enable_catalysts.comment:
Enables or disables the recpie catalysts in REI.
 Default: true

enable_click_area.comment:
Enables or disables the click area in the furance gui for REI.
 Default: true

gold_furnace_speed.comment:
Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.
 200 ticks is what a regular furnace takes.
 Default: 120

Number of ticks to complete one smelting operation.
